explanation:
STEP1: "aa" occurs in "aaa"
applying transition 2 ("aa"->"aaaaaa") gives "aaaaaaa"
STEP2: "aa" occurs in "aaaaaaa"
applying transition 2 ("aa"->"aaaaaa") gives "aaaaaaaaaaa"
STEP3: "a" occurs in "aaaaaaaaaaa"
applying transition 0 ("a"->"aa") gives "aaaaaaaaaaaa"
STEP4: "aaaaaaaaaaaa" occurs in "aaaaaaaaaaaa"
applying final transition ("aaaaaaaaaaaa"->"") gives ""
